extendedInfo.description: You want to relax, sleep better, and increase concentration?This app is ideal for people who are tired, stressed, with insomnia and had a hard day of work because it has natural soothing sounds of ocean waves, sound of rain, sound of animals of the forest, sound of forest, sound of flowing of water.Close your eyes, put on the headphones and choose one of the natural sounds and relax or sleep better.Train your concentration and relax listening to the natural sound. Choose a time and not think about anything until the sound ends. Should gradually increase the time to increase the concentration1. Natural Sound of ocean waves.2. Natural Sound of rain.3. Natural Sound of animals of the forest.4. Natural Sound of flowing of water.5. You can choose the songs.6. You can choose the time.7. Great quality of the sounds.8. Beautiful sounds.9. Beautiful backgrounds.10. The best relaxing sound!11. Music for sleep.12. Sound for babies sleep.13. You can put a nice sound to calm your baby and sleep like an angel.14. These nature sounds will help you relax, stay concentrated and focused.A relaxation technique (relaxation training) is any method (include audio therapy, sleep sounds and nature sounds), process, procedure, or activity that helps a person to relax, to attain a state of increased calmness, or otherwise reduce levels of anxiety, stress.People use nature sounds relaxation techniques for the following reasons, among others:- General well-being. - Insomnia therapy.- Stress management

reviews.title: Nature sounds to sleep
reviews.comment: Soothing as if I were there drifting, deeply, into the world nature has provided. Totally wonderful the best of the best ! I am THANKFUL you have put this together... :-)
reviews.author: Marla Solowey

reviews.title: Stop playing. Please \"
reviews.comment: Good sound loops,nice n clear,but when I try to exit out, the music. Keeps on playin n playin,stop I Say! Other than that issue, its decent n I go right ta sleep, ty.
reviews.author: Paula Eidson

reviews.title: TOTALLY BRILLIANT!
reviews.comment: I have tryed almost every free sleep app out there on android and this is the ONLY one that works, I use the beach waves track and it sounds so realistic! I also like the fact u can choose how long u want it on for. It\'s a nice touch having a matching picture for the track thats playing! Perfect 5 stars!
reviews.author: Caitlin Gibson

reviews.title: I heard about these free apps on Dr. oz
reviews.comment: I heard about these kind of apps on Dr. Oz. I just love it! I can associate all the sounds with happy places i have been. Cant listen to the rain unless i am wanting to go to sleep. Lol! 5 stars from me!
reviews.author: Susie Busby

reviews.title: Great sounds
reviews.comment: This app is great. I listen to the beach waves all the time and its seamless. I can\'t tell where it loops if it does. Great simple nature sounds :)
reviews.author: Heather Ashley

reviews.title: Gr8 App
reviews.comment: Thank you for the sound apps. They are helpful and fun. No problems; straight, simple, and useful.
reviews.author: Claire Daly

reviews.title: Cool sound
reviews.comment: The natural sound is too realistic great
reviews.author: edwin bringas

reviews.title: Nature sounds relax and sleep
reviews.comment: Awesome app, I am a Southern girl and I love the rain especially on a tin roof. You will love it...be bless\342\231\245
reviews.author: Vanessa Williams

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Music and sound are all great! I suffer with insomnia and this does help.
reviews.author: Karen Shurley

reviews.comment: Really great app. I\'m an insomniac that never has slept well. This app really helps me fall asleep very soundly. I love it!\tVery great love it soo much!!!!
reviews.author: Kayla Romig

reviews.title: In the lap of nature
reviews.comment: It feels like m sitting in the lap of nature.. Just so natural..love it Highly recommended Runs perfectly for as long as I wish on my android:)..never hangs or stops Love it Thanku developrr:)))
reviews.author: aks S

reviews.title: Nicely done!
reviews.comment: Easy set up. Easy-to-use. Nice selection of sounds. I like the choices for amount of play time, too.
reviews.author: Dan Brownfield

reviews.title: Quite ok!!
reviews.comment: I hate the same sound repeating after few minutes!! Chances are u may remember music n can recite it!! :D
reviews.author: akshay saraf

reviews.comment: I work in the interpreting field and this app is fantastic to help me destress. Love it! Plus it helps with my listening skills, each detailed sound!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very nice
reviews.comment: These are great sounds of nature..relaxing..good background picture too..But need more collection.. Please add another sounds.. Nice..
reviews.author: Petra Pahlevi

reviews.title: Good to fall asleep to.
reviews.comment: It doesn\'t always like to be shut off after choosing Infinite. . And sometimes it does stay on until u turn off when choosing Infinite.  I wake up during the night so it really needs to go for 8 hours at least. However,  still one of the most realistic sound machines out there. Just add a storm sound and we are cooking with gas.
reviews.author: Pam vaughan

reviews.title: Good app
reviews.comment: Good simple app. Relaxing and doesn\'t drain my tablet battery like other apps did. Good job
reviews.author: Tammy Alspaugh

reviews.title: Very realistic
reviews.comment: Very realistic sounds ..peaceful..need a few more sounds ..but still liked it
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: I\'m so grateful for this app. It helps my daughter sleep when we\'re on the go. It even helps me when I just can\'t seem to fall asleep.
reviews.author: Courtney Welch

reviews.title: Very simple app to use and has great sound quality
reviews.comment: Love the timer. Would b good to have a few more sounds especially since the quality is so good.
reviews.author: tony lenci
